mention.text: The tanker that caused the nation 's biggest oil spill
the greatest disaster to hit Alaska since the Good Friday earthquake 25 years ago
once-pristine Prince William Sound a disaster area as the toll on the waterway 's abundant wildlife began to mount
Prince William Sound a disaster area
the captain of the tanker Exxon Valdez , Joseph Hazelwood

a wildlife specialist sailed in the sound Saturday and observed 75 ducks and two otters coated with oil
